item.title: Celtic Meets Classical in Cambridge on Tuesday, February 7, 2023
item.description:
• Artist: Celtic Meets Classical
  • Date: Tuesday, February 7, 2023
  • Time: 7:30 pm
  • City: Cambridge
  • Venue: WGBH Studios
  • Address: 1 Guest Street
  • Country: US
  • Buy Tickets
  • Notes: a Celtic/Classical jam session featuring the Rasa String Quartet and the X-tet from Boston Baroque, featuring various works, including “A Short While to be Here…,” a new piece for both ensembles by violinist and composer Colin Jacobsen. Among the selections, you’ll hear the Rasa Quartet playing the traditional “Willie Coleman’s Jig” and have a chance to compare it to a Baroque gigue – the very same dance – by 17th-century composer Heinrich Biber. The program will be moderated by Anthony Rudel, General Manager of GBH Music.
  • Add to Google Calendar | Download iCal
